trans-unit.source: Specifies the Speech Synthesis Markup Language (SSML) action to be taken in rendering a given <see langword="TextFragment" />.
trans-unit.target: Especifica la acción de lenguaje de marcado de síntesis de voz (SSML) que se va a tomar para presentar un <see langword="TextFragment" /> dado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> represents requests for servicing a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> representa las solicitudes para dar servicio a un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: The actions correspond closely to elements in the SSML specification and are implemented on the text returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> property on a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.
trans-unit.target: Las acciones estrechamente corresponden a los elementos de la especificación de SSML y se implementan en el texto devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak%2A> propiedad en un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value associated with a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: El <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor asociado con un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propiedad.

trans-unit.source: Processing of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> value returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property is handled by a speech synthesizes implementation of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> method on a class derived from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.
trans-unit.target: El procesamiento de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> valor devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propiedad se controla mediante una voz sintetiza la implementación de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A> método en una clase derivada de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>.

trans-unit.source: The example below is part of a custom speech synthesis implementation inheriting from <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>, and using the use of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, and <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo siguiente forma parte de una implementación de síntesis de voz personalizados heredando de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml>y el uso de la utilización de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>, <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState>, y <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId>

trans-unit.source: The implementation of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>
trans-unit.target: La implementación de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineSsml.Speak%2A>

trans-unit.source: Receives an array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances and creates a new array of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances to be passed to the `Speak` method on an underlying synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Recibe una matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancias y crea una nueva matriz de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancias que se pasan a la `Speak` método en un motor de síntesis subyacente.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> enumeration value by found from the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property of each <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instance is Speak, the implementation
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> por obtener valor de enumeración de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Action%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propiedad de cada <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancia es hablar, la implementación

trans-unit.source: Translates Americanism to Britishisms in the text to be spoken.
trans-unit.target: Traduce Americanism a Britishisms en el texto que se va a hablar.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> property on the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfaces provided to the implementation support the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> event type, an event to drive a synthesizer progress meter is created.
trans-unit.target: Si el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> propiedad en el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.ITtsEngineSite.EventInterest%2A> interfaces proporcionadas para la compatibilidad de implementación el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEventId> tipo de evento, se crea un evento para controlar un indicador de progreso de sintetizador.

trans-unit.source: A speech rendering engine is then called with the modified <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> array.
trans-unit.target: A continuación, se llama a un motor de representación de voz con modificados <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> matriz.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> is to be used as the contents of a bookmark.
trans-unit.target: Indica que <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> se va a utilizar como contenido de un marcador.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<mark>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde a la etiqueta XML `<mark>` en la especificación de SSML.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no action has been determined from SSML input.
trans-unit.target: Indica que no se ha determinado ninguna acción de entrada de SSML.

trans-unit.source: The associated <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> is an unknown XML tag not part of the SSML standard.
trans-unit.target: El asociado <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> es una etiqueta XML desconocida no forma parte del estándar SSML.

trans-unit.source: This input that may be interpreted or ignored by at the discretion of a synthesis engine.
trans-unit.target: Esta entrada que puede interpretar u omitirla a discreción de un motor de síntesis.

trans-unit.source: Requests that input <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> text be interpreted as phonemes.
trans-unit.target: Solicita que el texto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> de entrada se interprete como fonemas.

trans-unit.source: Exact pronunciation is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> member of the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Pronunciación exacta especificada por el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Phoneme%2A> miembro de la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propiedad <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancias.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Phoneme>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde a la etiqueta XML `<Phoneme>` en la especificación de SSML.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> contains no text to be rendered as speech.
trans-unit.target: Indica que un <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> no contiene texto para presentarse como voz.

trans-unit.source: Duration of the silence is specified by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> member of the he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> object returned by the <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> property on <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instances.
trans-unit.target: Duración de la latencia es especificado por el <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState.Duration%2A> miembro de la he <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.FragmentState> objeto devuelto por la <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.State%2A> propiedad <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment> instancias.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<Silence>` XML tag in the SSML specification.
trans-unit.target: Corresponde a la etiqueta XML `<Silence>` en la especificación de SSML.

trans-unit.source: Requests that the associated <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> should be processed and spoken.
trans-unit.target: Solicita que el objeto <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> asociado se procese y se hable.

trans-unit.source: This is the default value of <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> for a <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>,
trans-unit.target: Este es el valor predeterminado de <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TtsEngineAction> para un <xref:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment>,

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<speak>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corresponde a la etiqueta XML `<speak>` en la especificación de SSML.

trans-unit.source: Indicates that text values provided by a <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> through its <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak" /> property are to be synthesize as individual characters.
trans-unit.target: Indica que los valores de texto proporcionados por <see cref="T:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment" /> a través de su propiedad <see cref="P:System.Speech.Synthesis.TtsEngine.TextFragment.TextToSpeak" /> se van a sintetizar como caracteres individuales.

trans-unit.source: This rendering includes punctuation, other than white space, as well as alphanumeric text.
trans-unit.target: Esta representación incluye signos de puntuación, que no sean espacios en blanco, así como texto alfanumérico.

trans-unit.source: For example thee associated text fragment "word!"
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo tres relacionados fragmento de texto "word".

trans-unit.source: should be synthsized into "w o r d exclamation point".
trans-unit.target: debe ser synthsized en "w o r exclamación d".

trans-unit.source: Indicates state of paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Indica el estado del párrafo.

trans-unit.source:
Corresponds to the `

` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target:
Corresponde a la etiqueta XML `

` en la especificación de SSML.

trans-unit.source: Indicates start of sentence.
trans-unit.target: Indica el inicio de la frase.

trans-unit.source: Corresponds to the `<s>` XML tag in the SSML specification
trans-unit.target: Corresponde a la etiqueta XML `<s>` en la especificación de SSML.
